name: Freedom Physics
description:
In a nutshell, Freedom Physics is a 2D physics engine with emphasis on easy to use Level editor where you can easily build, create and share your own levels and scenarios. Create your own conditions for victory or failure. Engineer complex objects to control and use in levels.

Freedom Physics is not like the usual game where you have a target/goal from the outset. It's More like a sandbox, and what you do with it, is up to you or the person who created the level/content.
The main idea of how to "Play the Game" in Freedom Physics is actually to create your own content/levels/scenarios etc.
Yet though they are more so intended as examples rather than legit game content, you can still play with the pre-included content/levels. Even use them as starting points for your own levels, copy, edit and save them. What the goal of each level (if any) is will vary from level to level.
There is also a dedicated page/site for uploading/viewing/downloaded other levels & content created by other users!

PLEASE NOTE: Some levels and content, such as local multiplayer intended levels may require use of at least 1 controller.

Full Info, Documentation and Video Tutorials can be found here: http://undeniable.info/FreedomPhysics/
